TopicTitle: Some inspirations for satellites from Berlin Air Show 2016

Articles.Content:
I was recently on the ILA 2016 (Berlin Air Show) and there was a space pavillon. Made some pictures of the satellite models and stuff from there to have some inspirational real life templates for tinkering.
If anyone is interested in having a look you can have if here (www.idenwen.de). They even had struts 

Since there where no really special aircraft, except of the Fouga Magister maybe, there is not much for inspirational plane designs.

Edited June 5, 2016 by Darkstar One
